1522450733_195Xafx3aZsxtngKo7D3XWgByQ5rY.body: In Aust, our ISP's block any torrent sites, i.e eztv, yts.ag etc. So we have to use a VPN. Even if at a public wifi, so we have no choice. ours are 99 per year, that AUD.
